name: oryx
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a large antelope (= a mammal like a deer) with dark marks on its face and legs, and long horns. Oryx live in dry areas of Africa and Arabia.
Luca Nichetti/EyeEm/EyeEm/GettyImages
